title: Top One Futures Check website
description: Top One Futures, based in the United States and established in April 2025, is a futures firm that lists a single program type: 1 Step. The firm supports the Tradovate, TradingView, and NinjaTrader platforms. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

forbidden_strategies: 10-Second Rule: Trades must be open > 10 seconds. 50%+ violation = profit removal.

payout_policy.minimum_payout: Varies by account size. Elite/S2F/Instant: $1500-$3500 max per withdrawal.
payout_policy.details: Elite: 90/10, profit targets 6%/5%/4%. S2F: 90/10, 10 trading days (7 profitable). IGNITE: 90/10, 5% profit target, no min days. Max payouts by size: $1500-$3500.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Allowed only between same type/size accounts. Max 3 Elite/Instant, 5 S2F Sim PRO, 6 IGNITE accounts.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: EAs/bots NOT allowed. Manual skill-based trading only.
firm_rules.inactivity_rule: 14 calendar days. No timer on Elite challenge phase.
firm_rules.weekend_holding: NOT allowed. Close by 4:10 PM EST. Auto-liquidation if open.
forbidden_strategies: 10-Second Rule: Trades must be open > 10 seconds. 50%+ violation = profit removal.

seo_content:
Top One Futures Technical Infrastructure

Top One Futures, based in the United States and established in April 2025, is a futures firm that lists a single program type: 1 Step. The firm supports the Tradovate, TradingView, and NinjaTrader platforms. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
